text:
Rahman debuts as film-maker

Oscar-winning music composer A.R. Rahman has unveiled the poster of his film 99 Songs , with which he is making his foray in production and scriptwriting.

The vibrant poster sees a couple hanging onto a piano which is suspended from the sky. “With your support and good wishes, I’m pleased to share my movie’s first poster!,” Rahman shared on his Facebook page. — PTI
title: ENT-RAHMAN (DES1)
